name: tickle
effect: Lowers the target’s Attack and Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Attack and Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.
